title: Fix UI displaying incorrect bands/shows/venues content

requirements.text: Remove all UI elements, text, and references related to booking bands, shows, venues, concerts, tour dates, event listings, or ticketing from the frontend application

quotes: Well we gotta fix the issue

acceptanceCriteria: No text or UI elements mention bands booking shows or venues
No references to concerts, tour dates, or event management
No ticketing or venue-related features are visible
All pages display only social networking features (profiles, friends, posts, feed)

requirements.text: Ensure all user-facing text and UI elements clearly communicate that MetalHead Underground is a social networking platform for 21+ metal/rock/punk fans to connect, share posts, and make friends

quotes: Well we gotta fix the issue

acceptanceCriteria: Landing page clearly describes the app as a social network for metalheads
All feature descriptions emphasize user profiles, friend connections, and social feed
No confusion about the app's core purpose as a community platform
Marketing copy focuses on connecting people, not booking services

requirements.text: Verify that all existing social networking features (user profiles with favorite bands/genres, friend requests, social feed with posts/likes/comments, blocking, reporting) are correctly displayed and functional in the UI
acceptanceCriteria: Feed page shows post composer and user posts
Friends page displays friends list and pending requests
Profile page allows editing display name, bio, location, favorite genres, and bands
Blocking and reporting features are accessible
All social networking features work as intended

constraints: Do not modify backend logic or data models
Preserve all existing social networking functionality
Keep the rock/metal/punk aesthetic and branding
nonGoals: Adding any band booking or venue management features
Creating concert or event listing functionality
Changing the app's core purpose as a social network
